node.name: The Goal
node.rich_text: Goal ka asli matlab kya hota hai?
“Goal = Future ka ek aisa state jo tu chahta hai aur jiske liye tu consciously mehnat karne ke liye ready hai.” • Goal koi vague khayal nahi hota. •
Ye ek clear, measurable aur desirable destination hoti hai.
• Agar tu clearly nahi bata sakta: “Main ye kar paaya to meri goal puri ho gayi,” To wo abhi goal nahi hai,
sirf ek vague sapna hai
2. Goals ke types hote hain:
3. Model choose karna mushkil hota hai
• Market mein dozens of goal-setting models hain: ◇ SMART goals ◇ OKRs ◇ WOOP, etc. • Sabka focus alag hota hai. • Lekin dikkat ye hai:
Jo model comfortable lage, wo effective nahi bhi ho sakta.
◇ Har model try karna â†’ time consuming ◇ Jo effective ho, wo uncomfortable bhi lag sakta hai. ◇
Research ne bataya:
Jo log
specific + challenging goals
rakhte hain, wo 90% cases mein zyada successful hote hain.
4. Tera goal hi tera raasta define karta hai
Agar tu sirf solution copy karega, bina khud ke soch se, to: •
Brain ke neurons link nahi banayenge
• Aur tu real learning se vanchit rahega
Kisi aur ka rasta tere liye fix nahi hota

Agar kisi aur ne ek rasta follow karke success payi, zaroori nahi ki tu bhi wahi follow kare. • Har hacker ka journey alag hota hai. • Agar tu “ladder use nahi karna jaanta,” iska matlab ye nahi ki tu chhat tak nahi pahuch sakta — tu
rope bhi use kar sakta hai
jump bhi kar sakta hai
, ya
wall climb bhi kar sakta hai

row.cell: “Mujhe confident feel karna hai jab main hacking karu.”
“Time bhi bachana hai, deep bhi seekhna hai.”
Sochne lagega, galti karega, learn karega
